mapper.update: update b_outpay set outpayid=outpayid ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,traderid=#{traderid} ,contractid=#{contractid} ,sumamt=#{sumamt} ,taildiffamt=#{taildiffamt} ,settleid=#{settleid} ,checkno=#{checkno} ,accid=#{accid} ,accamt=#{accamt} ,usepreamt=#{usepreamt} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,remark=#{remark} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} where outpayid=#{outpayid}

update b_outpay set outpayid=outpayid ,billdate=#{billdate} ,billcode=#{billcode} ,billstate=#{billstate} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,storageid=#{storageid} ,traderid=#{traderid} ,contractid=#{contractid} ,sumamt=#{sumamt} ,taildiffamt=#{taildiffamt} ,settleid=#{settleid} ,checkno=#{checkno} ,accid=#{accid} ,accamt=#{accamt} ,usepreamt=#{usepreamt} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,spuserid=#{spuserid} ,sptime=#{sptime} ,remark=#{remark} ,updatetime=#{updatetime} where 1=1 and outpayid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and outpayid =#{Where_Id} and outpayid=#{Where_outpayid} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and traderid=#{Where_traderid} and contractid=#{Where_contractid} and sumamt=#{Where_sumamt} and taildiffamt=#{Where_taildiffamt} and settleid=#{Where_settleid} and checkno=#{Where_checkno} and accid=#{Where_accid} and accamt=#{Where_accamt} and usepreamt=#{Where_usepreamt} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and remark=#{Where_remark} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime}
mapper.select: select t.outpayid "outpayid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.traderid "traderid", t.contractid "contractid", t.sumamt "sumamt", t.taildiffamt "taildiffamt", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.accamt "accamt", t.usepreamt "usepreamt", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_outpay t where outpayid=#{outpayid}

select t.outpayid "outpayid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.traderid "traderid", t.contractid "contractid", t.sumamt "sumamt", t.taildiffamt "taildiffamt", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.accamt "accamt", t.usepreamt "usepreamt", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_outpay t where 1=1 and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.sumamt=#{sumamt} and t.taildiffamt=#{taildiffamt} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.accamt=#{accamt} and t.usepreamt=#{usepreamt} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}

select t.outpayid "outpayid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.traderid "traderid", t.contractid "contractid", t.sumamt "sumamt", t.taildiffamt "taildiffamt", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.accamt "accamt", t.usepreamt "usepreamt", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_outpay t where 1=1 and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.sumamt=#{sumamt} and t.taildiffamt=#{taildiffamt} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.accamt=#{accamt} and t.usepreamt=#{usepreamt} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}
mapper.delete: delete from b_outpay where 1=1 and outpayid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and outpayid =#{Where_Id} and outpayid=#{Where_outpayid} and billdate=#{Where_billdate} and billcode=#{Where_billcode} and billstate=#{Where_billstate} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and storageid=#{Where_storageid} and traderid=#{Where_traderid} and contractid=#{Where_contractid} and sumamt=#{Where_sumamt} and taildiffamt=#{Where_taildiffamt} and settleid=#{Where_settleid} and checkno=#{Where_checkno} and accid=#{Where_accid} and accamt=#{Where_accamt} and usepreamt=#{Where_usepreamt} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and spuserid=#{Where_spuserid} and sptime=#{Where_sptime} and remark=#{Where_remark} and updatetime=#{Where_updatetime}
mapper.select: select t.outpayid "outpayid", t.billdate "billdate", t.billcode "billcode", t.billstate "billstate", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.storageid "storageid", t.traderid "traderid", t.contractid "contractid", t.sumamt "sumamt", t.taildiffamt "taildiffamt", t.settleid "settleid", t.checkno "checkno", t.accid "accid", t.accamt "accamt", t.usepreamt "usepreamt", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.spuserid "spuserid", t.sptime "sptime", t.remark "remark", t.updatetime "updatetime" from b_outpay t where 1=1 and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.sumamt=#{sumamt} and t.taildiffamt=#{taildiffamt} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.accamt=#{accamt} and t.usepreamt=#{usepreamt} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}

select count(*) from b_outpay t where 1=1 and t.outpayid=#{outpayid} and t.outpayid!=#{NoId} and t.billdate=#{billdate} and t.billcode=#{billcode} and t.billstate=#{billstate} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.storageid=#{storageid} and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.contractid=#{contractid} and t.sumamt=#{sumamt} and t.taildiffamt=#{taildiffamt} and t.settleid=#{settleid} and t.checkno=#{checkno} and t.accid=#{accid} and t.accamt=#{accamt} and t.usepreamt=#{usepreamt} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.spuserid=#{spuserid} and t.sptime=#{sptime} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.updatetime=#{updatetime}
SELECT max(billcode) FROM b_outpay where billcode like CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-%d"),"%") and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
